Interface NeuronVisitor

All Known Subinterfaces:
NeuralNetworkInitializer
All Known Implementing Classes:
AdalineInitializer, ConstantInitializer, HeInitializer, PerceptronInitializer, RandomNormalizedWeightInitializer, XavierInitializer
@Visitor public interface NeuronVisitor
A visitor interface for traversing a NeuralNetwork.

This interface follows the Visitor Pattern, allowing clients to perform operations on neurons, layers, and connections without modifying the network structure. Implementations can override any of the default methods to handle specific events during traversal.

All methods have default empty implementations, so you can override only the methods you need.

See Also:
  • NeuralNetwork
  • Neuron

    Description
    default void
    enterLayer(NeuralNetwork neuralNetwork, int layerIndex)
    Called when entering a specific layer in the network.
    default void
    enterNetwork(NeuralNetwork neuralNetwork)
    Called when entering the entire network before any layers or neurons are visited.
    default void
    exitLayer(NeuralNetwork neuralNetwork, int layerIndex)
    Called after all neurons in a specific layer have been visited.
    default void
    exitNetwork(NeuralNetwork neuralNetwork)
    Called after all layers and neurons have been visited in the network.
    default void
    visitConnection(NeuralNetwork neuralNetwork, Neuron source, int fromLayer, int fromIndex, Neuron target, int toLayer, int toIndex, float weight)
    Called when visiting a connection (synapse) between two neurons.
    default void
    visitNeuron(NeuralNetwork neuralNetwork, Neuron neuron, int layerIndex, int neuronIndex)
    Called when visiting a single neuron in a specific layer.

  • Method Details

    • enterNetwork

      default void enterNetwork(NeuralNetwork neuralNetwork)
      Called when entering the entire network before any layers or neurons are visited.
      Parameters:
      neuralNetwork - the neural network being traversed

    • exitNetwork

      default void exitNetwork(NeuralNetwork neuralNetwork)
      Called after all layers and neurons have been visited in the network.
      Parameters:
      neuralNetwork - the neural network that was traversed

    • enterLayer

      default void enterLayer(NeuralNetwork neuralNetwork, int layerIndex)
      Called when entering a specific layer in the network.
      Parameters:
      neuralNetwork - the neural network being traversed
      layerIndex - the index of the layer being entered

    • exitLayer

      default void exitLayer(NeuralNetwork neuralNetwork, int layerIndex)
      Called after all neurons in a specific layer have been visited.
      Parameters:
      neuralNetwork - the neural network being traversed
      layerIndex - the index of the layer being exited

    • visitNeuron

      default void visitNeuron(NeuralNetwork neuralNetwork, Neuron neuron, int layerIndex, int neuronIndex)
      Called when visiting a single neuron in a specific layer.
      Parameters:
      neuralNetwork - the neural network being traversed
      neuron - the neuron being visited
      layerIndex - the index of the layer containing the neuron
      neuronIndex - the index of the neuron within its layer

    • visitConnection

      default void visitConnection(NeuralNetwork neuralNetwork, Neuron source, int fromLayer, int fromIndex, Neuron target, int toLayer, int toIndex, float weight)
      Called when visiting a connection (synapse) between two neurons.
      Parameters:
      neuralNetwork - the neural network being traversed
      source - the source neuron of the connection
      fromLayer - the layer index of the source neuron
      fromIndex - the index of the source neuron within its layer
      target - the target neuron of the connection
      toLayer - the layer index of the target neuron
      toIndex - the index of the target neuron within its layer
      weight - the weight of the connection
